name: Astray (itch) (AnomalousGames)
description:
"Astray " is a first-person psychological thriller. This game takes place in a town locals call "The devil's settlement".

ASTRAY BACKSTORY

This story tragically starts with the birth of a particular boy with red eyes. Since it was a small town the rumors go out of what they called was "The Devils Child". Everyone feared and neglected him even his own family. One faithful day he had enough, he killed everyone who had neglected him family, friends, every single one of them. the town was terrified and they all tried to move out but it was too late. Chernobyl sector 4 exploded and the town is now referred to as "The devil's settlement".

WHO YOU ARE

You play Adrian Reed a paranormal investigator who at the request of his followers decides to go to a town close to Chernobyl known as "The devil's settlement".  Locals say that this place is inhabited by restless souls of the dead seeking revenge because of their fallen life.

FEATURES First Person  Interactable Environment Small Puzzles Gunplay And Much More! Photosensitive seizure warning

A very small percentage of people may experience a seizure when exposed to certain visual images, including flashing lights or patterns that may appear in video games. Even people who have no history of seizures or epilepsy may have an undiagnosed condition that can cause these “photosensitive epileptic seizures” while playing video games.
